text: a l laoh mha chreah saat del ban noam yk khnhom robsa trong ( mou ham meat) thveudamnaer now peloyb chenhpi mea sche t a l ha rm ( mea kkah) towkean mea sche t a l oe k sar( yerousaealoem) del yeung ban brasetthopr chy now choumvinh vea( mea sche t a l oe k sar) ku daembi yeung nung bangheanh aoy ke kheunh pi phosdo tang neanea robsa yeung . pit brakd nasa trong mha lyy mha kheunh
